NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/Div.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING (I-III Floor), JANPATH BHAVAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :  24 /09/2012 
 
AVSEC  CIRCULAR NO. 14 / 2012 
 
Subject : PERMISSION FOR  VEHICLE FACILITY FROM VIP PARKING  
                AREA TO TARMAC AND VICE-VERSA AT AIRPORTS IN  
                RESPECT  OF  SHRI SHATRUGHAN SINHA, MEMBER OF  
                PARLIAMENT, LOK SABHA.  
 
 
In continuation to BCAS Circular No.36/2005 dated 30.08.2005,              
Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha is permitted to avail 
the facility of Airport Operators’ ferry vehicle  from VIP parking area to tarmac 
and vice-versa at all civil airports in the country for a period of three months 
with immediate effect on medical grounds.   
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security(CA). 
 
 
 
 
( R.N.Dhoke, IPS ) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
Distribution  : As per list attached.        
  
Copy for information to : 
 
MCA
